content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Hello Haoyu,

Let's start the negotiation. What is your initial offer for the rental price? Remember, we are only discussing the rental price, not any additional responsibilities, lease term conditions, or utility costs.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am very interested in the apartment. However, I am a student and have a limited budget. I would like to propose a price of 750 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's a low offer, Haoyu. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer. Remember, I am trying to get the highest price possible for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. How about 800 Euro per month? This is a fair price considering the location and the amenities.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's still not high enough for me, Haoyu. I want more for my apartment. Please make another offer. Remember, I am trying to get the highest price possible for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am willing to increase my offer to 850 Euro per month. This reflects the quality of the apartment and its central location. I believe it's a fair and competitive price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's better, Haoyu. But I believe my apartment is worth even more. Please make another offer. Remember, I am trying to get the highest price possible for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. I am prepared to go up to 900 Euro per month. This is a generous offer that values the apartment's desirability. I hope we can agree on this price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, I think we are getting closer. But I believe my apartment is worth even more. Please make another offer. Remember, I am trying to get the highest price possible for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am willing to offer 950 Euro per month. This is a competitive price that reflects the market value of similar apartments in the area. I hope this is acceptable to you.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, that's a good offer. But I believe my apartment is worth even more. Please make another offer. Remember, I am trying to get the highest price possible for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
